issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

fields.summary: [JDK8] Set minimum version of Hadoop 3 to JDK 8

LGTM.  +1 (non-binding).

What I want to know is how this test has been failing consistently for 16 months without anyone noticing...
Committed this to trunk. Thanks [~templedf] and [~asuresh] for reviewing.

bq. What I want to know is how this test has been failing consistently for 16 months without anyone noticing...
I guess the test was broken by upgrading the version of java compiler. (HADOOP-11858) The test passed at May 16 01:54, but the test failed at May 16 23:05.
